Scifi.title: Stranger Things
Scifi.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

New.title: The French Dispatch
New.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in 'The French Dispatch' magazine.

New.title: Dune
New.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

New.title: The Last Duel
New.description: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.
